history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04483
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 10068, "OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ORGANIC AGRICULTURE ACT OF 2010", APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, PROVIDING STIFFER PENALTIES AND SANCTIONS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-10
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2020-01-30)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-05
          -The Committee created a technical working group (TWG), to be chaired by Rep. Sharon S. Garin, to further study the bill.
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-12-11
          -The Chair, Rep. Sharon S. Garin, directed all resource persons to submit their agency's official position to the Committee for the drafting of the substitute bill to be presented to the Mother Committee.
MOTHER BILL: HB06878
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-09-13
